feed.title: BigBlueButton Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.12
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains a fix to sharing webcam as content. Several behind-the-scenes improvements related to media, accessibility and exporting annotations are included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Improve screen reader accessibility for polling modal by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20798 * fix(audio): transparent listen only state inconsistencies, build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.14.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20752 * fix(video): camera cannot be shared as content by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20832 * fix(presentation): presentation snapshot overflowing the slide [2.7] by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20831 * fix(video): webcam fails to be loaded on preview when changing profiles by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20849 * fix: Ensure size estimate is applied to text shapes while typing by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20809

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20808 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20827 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20865 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language tr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20854

build and configuration

  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.14.1 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20829

docs

  • docs: remove extra entry for webcamBackgroundURL by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20838
  • docs: fix name of errorRedirectUrl in api docs by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20839

bbb-export-annotations

  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): Handle text rendering issue by @danielpetri1 in #20857

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.11...v2.7.12

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.12.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 331

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.13
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains several client and core fixes and improvements to media.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

newly added * feat: add WebRTC stats information to client logs by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21036 * feat: add experimental support for ICE restart by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21008

fixes * fix(audio): change unmute/unhold flow to work around FS unmute stutter by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20921 * Fix: Conference PIN (phone dial-in) doesn't show the needed pound sign in popup by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21113 * fix(users-context): phantom user by @Arthurk12 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20253 * fix: disable ICE restart for recvonly endpoints by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21189 * fix(whiteboard): Update shape restriction logic by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21111 * fix: Correct cursor position calculation for touch events by @KDSBrowne in #20748 * chore: update link to which locales are supported by Gladia by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20925 * chore(client): Security upgrade axios, meteor-node-stubs by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21178 * chore(client): Add logs for recording notify action by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21185

test * test: removing temporally external video test from ci by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20955 * test: Backporting timer/stopwatch test to 2.7 by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20954 * test: backport test disable self-view by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20982 * test: Backport share camera as content test to 2.7 by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20964 * [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.4 to 1.7.4 (test) by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20945 * [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.4 to 1.7.4 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20939 * test: Update timer test to avoid false failures + fix hide presentation param on unrelated tests by @antonbsa in #21190 * test: add test webcam background by passing URL by @gabriellpr in #21007

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language pt_BR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20881 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20903 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ca by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21013 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ru by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20976 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language hu_HU by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20968 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language gl by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21046 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language cs_CZ by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21087

build and configuration

  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.14.2 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20998
  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.15.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21180
  • [2.7] build: Bump bbb-pads to 1.5.3 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21193
  • chore: upgrade FreeSWITCH to 1.10.12 (port) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21181
  • build: Require libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra for export-annotations by @antobinary in #21216

docs

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade @docusaurus/preset-classic from 3.0.1 to 3.5.0 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20900
  • docs: Testing plan update (what's new features) by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20913
  • docs: escape non mdx compliant characters by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21072
  • docs: fix name for notifyRecordingIsOn create parameter [2.7] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21078

bbb-export-annotations

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.4 to 1.7.4 (export-ann) by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20946

Core

  • fix: Breakout rooms show incorrect presentation filename by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/20947
  • build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 3 directories with 7 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21182
  • fix (akka-apps): Banned users being able to rejoin (when they have customdata) by @gustavotrott in #21210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.12...v2.7.13

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.13.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 350

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.14
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains several updates to the build process, tests and a new client configuration aiming to space out the guest approvals to prevent performance hiccups. A newer version of sfu is also included.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Space out approval of guests to better handle larger groups by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21416

test * test: Override default presentation on CREATE meeting API call by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21200 * test: breakout room with different presentations by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21076 * test: Prevent user from posting public chat by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21257

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21244

build and configuration

  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.16.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21276
  • Consistently call docker with sudo privileges (2.7 backport) by @schrd in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21364
  • build: Umask fixes for 2.7 build scripts by @schrd in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21366

docs

  • docs: allowPromoteGuestToModerator documentation tweak [2.7] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21242

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.13...v2.7.14

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.14.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 355

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.15
entry.content:
This patch release fixes viewing the learning analytics dashboard after the session is over for cluster proxy setups.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix: Check if user is found before looking up role by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21490 * fix (LAD/cluster) (backport 2.7): Enable LearningDashboard cookie support across different subdomains by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21520 * fix (html5): prevent error if learningDashboardBase is missing by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21522

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language nb_NO by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21516

Core

  • docs: clarify on LAD default value comment by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21510

docs

  • docs: Update url for LAD in cluster proxy setup by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21511

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.14...v2.7.15

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.15.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 359

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.16
entry.content:
This patch release fixes the snapshot of current slide functionality, updates quite a few dependency libraries and brings a fix for media devices not detected correctly on newer FireFox versions. A few more adjustments are listed below.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * [Snyk] Security upgrade meteor-node-stubs from 1.2.10 to 1.2.12 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21621 * fix: Snapshot of slide shows only annotations but no image by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21747 * chore(sec): bbb-html5 npm audit by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21834 * fix(webcam): add option to skip initial enumerateDevices by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21848 * fix(webcam): add rollback to video-preview gUM, improve logs by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21864 * fix: Apostrophe character not displayed correctly in guest panel [2.7] by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21858 * [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.7.7 to 1.7.8 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21753

test * test: [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.7.4 to 1.7.8 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21772 * test: [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.7.4 to 1.7.8 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21771 * test: adds the reactions tests for 2.7 by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21560

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language nb_NO by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21547 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language gl by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21758 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ko_KR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21837

Core

  • fix(bbb-web): Check to see if moderator has left in moderator count by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21750
  • chore(sec): bump embedded tomcat to 9.0.96 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21824
  • chore(sec): bump tika (mime type detection) to 3.0.0 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21823
  • Refactor(bbb-web): Remove unnecessary pagination data and fix total elements bug by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21644

build and configuration

  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.16.1 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21603
  • [2.7]build: update link to download FS sounds.tar.gz by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21635

export-annotations

  • export-ann: [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.7.4 to 1.7.8 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/21770

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.15...2.7.16

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.16.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 369
